translations: 拆毁，拆除（建筑物）；（意外）毁坏，破坏；推翻，驳倒（观点或理论）；<非正式>轻易击败，完胜；<非正式>狼吞虎咽地吃，很快吃光；伤害（感情），破坏（计划）

sentences.sentence: Our intention was quite the opposite – to demolish rumours that have surrounded him since he took office.
sentences.translation: 我们的意图恰恰相反–要粉碎自他就职以来就缠着他的谣言。

sentences.sentence: We are going to demolish the old building.
sentences.translation: 我们准备爆破这座旧大楼。

sentences.sentence: A record she would demolish the following year!
sentences.translation: 而这个记录她明年肯定能打破。
